short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add an outline style and see the boundaries of every HTML element without affecting the layout (sizing or positioning).

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will help you to add an outline style and see the boundaries of every HTML element without affecting the layout (sizing or positioning), it's great for web design, or just to verify that your HTML + CSS code is working as expected.
